mapper.insert: insert into device.device (device_id, device_name, device_manufacturer, device_status, create_date, device_type, user_id, location,cluster_id,node_id,endpoint_id) values (#{device.deviceId},#{device.deviceName},#{device.deviceManufacturer},#{device.deviceStatus},#{device.createDate},#{device.deviceType}, #{device.userId},#{device.location},#{device.cluster_id},#{device.node_id},#{device.endpoint_id})
